entry.title: County Commissioners approve of contract to patch Douglas County Museum roof
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Douglas County Commissioners approved a contract with Pressure Point Roofing, Inc., during Wednesday's regular meeting, to install an overlay roofing at the Douglas County Museum Building for $82,437.

entry.title: Douglas County approves of contract with Verizon Wireless to replace tower
entry.summary: YONCALLA — A Verizon Wireless service tower in Yoncalla will be replaced, after Douglas County Commissioners signed off on a contract during Wednesday's weekly board meeting.

entry.title: Online cooking course for young adults experiencing disabilities, nonprofit program
entry.summary: Reality Kitchen Nonprofit is making customer service and cooking skills a reality for young adults experiencing intellectual and developmental disabilities. Soon, its in-person curriculum will expand online to reach rural communities.
